titles.title: Native Health Access Improvement Act of 2017
Native Health Access Improvement Act of 2017
To amend the Public Health Service Act to improve behavioral health outcomes for American Indians and Alaskan Natives, and for other purposes.
Native Health Access Improvement Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.
